name: Oberoi terms and condition
terms:
Our Terms and Conditions

1. GST: Extra as applicable, present rate is 18%.
2. Inspection shall be done by RDSO based upon the documents provided by you.
3. Any permit required for welding at site will be arranged by you for our people.
4. Any road permit/way bill required for transporting the material from our works to your site will be
provided by you as the material would be dispatched from Uttarakhand.
5. Freight Charges: Extra as applicable
6. RDSO Inspection Charges: Extra Rs. 44309.00 per batch or part thereof
7. The standard consumables will be supplied with portions as follows: Moulds (3 pc.) – 2%extra,
Luting sand- 3Kg per portion, Sparkler- 2% extra, Grinding stone – 1 no. per 25 portions, Mould
Shoe: 1 pair per 200 portions,Crucible Charge: 1 no. per portions, Bentonite Powder : 10% of
Each portion.
8. Our supervisor will get done complete execution work at your site. Supervision is mandatory for
supply order & without supervisor; we cannot give material to you. All expenses of supervisor such
as fooding ,lodging,travelling etc. will be borne by you.
